entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • random.next(low, hi) his is sometimes exclusive and sometimes inclusive. #59788
  • API Named SetupDiEnumDeviceInterfaces Of setupapi.dll Error At .net core platform #59787
  • JIT: a number of OSR stress tests failing with an assert #59785
    7.0.0
  • Android x64: `Loader.classloader` runtime tests failing with `Error trying to get device: cmd: Can't find service: package` #59779
  • [Android] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates ExportCertificatePems_MultiCert Failure #59777
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend Memory Mapped Files support #59776
  • [API Proposal]: File.WriteAllBytes overload for Span<byte> and ReadOnlySpan<byte> #59770
  • Mono does not load native shared libraries next to an assembly with a DllImport to it. #59766
  • Segfault in tracing/eventpipe/reverseouter/reverseouter/reverseouter.sh on Ubuntu. #59758
  • Bug System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher #59756
  • .NET 6 regression on writing to character device #59754
    6.0.0
  • It’s not possible to send a SIGTERM signal, which requests the application to gracefully terminate #59746
  • Community Triagers Trial #59744
  • [wasm] Regression. mono-aot-cross asserts with function:mono_method_to_ir, VAR 1 (TValue_REF) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #59739
  • CI failure in "Build Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono" leg #59736

Closed

  • Missing tag/release for 5.0.10 #59250
  • bundled_self_contained_nocompression_app_run_succeeds blocking CI #53551
    6.0.0
  • Host tests often fail on text file busy issues #53587
    6.0.0
  • Please provide MSI installer for .Net5 #58859
  • Licence of Microsoft.Extensions in .NET Core 3.1.x ? #59740
  • MemoryMappedViewAccessor: Dispose flushes on temporary files #59606
  • Breaking changes on ConfigurationBinder behaviour #58330
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21454.3] Cannot create instance of type 'Sentry.Dsn' when launch just-an-email #58852
    6.0.0
  • JsonSourceGenerator - ArgumentException key already added. #58985
    6.0.0
  • IHost.RunAsync() never completes via pm2 start and stop. #59644
    7.0.0
  • How to implement Stream nowadays? #59403
  • Alpine docker image does not obey local timezone anymore #59636
    6.0.0
  • Linux/Arm: BBJ_ALWAYS block remains unvisited during dominance computation #59298
    7.0.0
  • .NET6 preview 7 cannot find System.Net.Quic automatically. #59730
    7.0.0
  • Test failed file_io.GetFileSize.test1 #58481
    7.0.0
  • Dotnet command cannot be found after installing .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21476.4-osx-x64.pkg on Apple M1. #59691
  • Exception in TLS handshake on one windows machine but not the other #59735
  • Unable to generate a core dump of .NET 5 application in OSX #55211
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Building sourcebuild leg with portable flag #59786
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle version #59783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataStaticVersion to prevent source-build from building w/6.0 version. #59782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue with incorrect handling of optimized method layouts #59781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm][debugger] Fix reuse buffer #59775
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59774
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reusing buffer for debugger #59773
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Stop running runtime tests on Android arm64, until the installation timeout gets fixed #59772
  • [release/6.0] Treat 'abstract' properties the same as 'virtual' for src-gen #59771
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #59767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update WCF dependencies on the compat pack #59764
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add new analyzers to CodeAnalysis.globalconfig files #59763
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove ILStrip temporarily to retain ActiveIssue attributes in release mobile device configuration #59762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Partially disable test #59760
    area-System.IO
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix NRT warnings in source generated code #59755
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Update DllImportGenerator style to match repo conventions #59753
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • [Mono]: Fix hfa type field count to handle more cases under LLVM. #59751
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during delegate invoke #59749
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update HostFactoryResolver to account for lack of application name with new host pattern #59743
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Obsolete Regex.CompileToAssembly #59734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59106
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not enregister Return SP check variable #59759
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retry installer Process.Start if ETXTBSY #59765
    area-Host
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Revert bind single elements to array in configuration binder #59733
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • fix few more QUIC tests that can hang #59682
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use cmakedefine in eglib config #59623
    community-contribution
  • Treat 'abstract' properties the same as 'virtual' for src-gen #59707
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger after ts changes #59702
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add initial codespaces support for dotnet/runtime #59723
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Increase the number of preallocated trampolines for Mono FullAOT runtime test runs #59737
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Time Zone when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #59727
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Add PEM exports to certificates #59674
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Acknowledge community triagers in area-owners.md #59748
    area-Meta
  • Arm: Include BBJ_ALWAYS blocks in dominance calculation #59376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • delay locking in `ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable` until necessary #59656
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Prefer readonlyspan properties over readonly array fields #59670
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #59698
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59480
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use new cross-build images for arm/arm64 builds #59534
    community-contribution
  • Append _FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 to CMAKE_REQUIRED_DEFINITIONS #59504
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59510
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some AOTCONST instructions if they are not used. #59699
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Deduplicate epilogs in Type.operator== #59711
    area-System.Runtime
  • Antigen: Change Antigen's helixqueue to public #59657
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #59725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Fix for GitHub issue #59432 and the corresponding regression test #59663
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Build one MonoTargetsTasks assembly for Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk pack #59720
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix assert for chain of ASG nodes after tail-calls #59708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • Fixes #38162 #56860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Refactor `fgMorphCast` #59713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Host
  • fixes to get Quic working on macOS #59728
    os-mac-os-x, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [draft][wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #59572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add openSUSE 15.2 #59574
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 #59578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • LLHTTP ConfigureRequest/other simplification & fixes #1606
    area-LLHTTP

Merged

  • Exploration support of symbolic regex into symbolic NFA #1602

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add SSA form #1598

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1179 (for `-r`) over-reports #21560

Closed

  • Open issues: Support targeting iOS and Android with the .NET SDK #11275
    6.0.1xx
  • Support installing workloads in user folder #18104
    6.0.1xx
  • winexe vs maui, `<outputtype>app</outputtype>` #18799
    6.0.1xx
  • .NET 6 Support targeting iOS and Android with the .NET SDK #12899
    6.0.1xx
  • `sql-cache` is no longer bundled in dotnet-sdk but still in document #13016
  • Localized resources in the CLI adds 53 MB on disk and increases time-to-main by ~50% #16196
    6.0.2xx
  • CLI files layout includes "ref" directories that aren't required and add to size on disk/installer time #16197
    6.0.2xx
  • Unable to compile my .net core app using build #21498
    Discussion
  • `dotnet tool install -a` works great #21392
  • Separate the logic of including extra GeneratedInstallers from Package step #8727
    Backlog
  • Cannot install prereleased tool package from dotnet-install-tool without specifying the exact version #9037
    6.0.1xx
  • Unable to update global tool to the latest prerelease version #2551
    Discussion
  • version comparison is not robust #2158
    3.0.1xx
  • Investigate running CI in Linux/ARM64 box #10361
    3.0.1xx
  • official documentation for DotNetCliToolReference netcoreapp2.2 cap #10396
    3.0.1xx
  • Enable C++/CLI tests #3785
    7.0.1xx
  • Different result when running test in mac temp directory #3923
    Backlog
  • User facing string view for dotnet search #10586

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1394078 #21563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix over-warning bug when specifying runtime CLI option on dotnet run #21561
    Area-CLI
  • Update man pages #21557
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #21549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21539
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove sql-cache from dotnet help #21464
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fixes pack incrementalism issue (#21506) #21541
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build dependency #21505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fixes pack incrementalism issue #21506
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21487
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make workload descriptions localizable #21189
    Area-Workloads
  • Prevent GlobalUsings file from being cleaned. #21460
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix Bash shebang for scripts to run under FreeBSD #21361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make aspnet-browser-refresh.js tolerate duplication insertions #21429
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It looks like NullableWalker is not going to properly handle an initializer for BoundNoPiaObjectCreationExpression #56863
  • Automate building runtime with debug compiler #56854
    17.1
  • Go To Definition for typeof(Program) highlights the first keyword/identifier in Program.cs #56848
    Backlog
  • Async lightbulb performance improvements #56843
    17.1

Closed

  • String interpolation + LangVersion=10.0 + out parameters results in CS1615 #56579
    17.0
  • Parser should allow lambdas with `ref` return types in assignments without requiring parentheses #54258
    17.0
  • Values in CompilerVisibleProperty containing #s don't transfer to source generators #56656
  • Add the ability to escape strings with special characters (e.g. quotes) when pasting into Visual Studio. #56661
  • Semantic classification is currently unavailable #56766
    17.0
  • Allow finalize compilation to incrementally update a prior version #46418
    Backlog
  • Re-enable TrackedGeneratorDriver.WithPendingEdits #46419
    Backlog
  • Tons of assertion failures when building runtime with debug compiler #56043
    17.0
  • Implementing auto-properties should not generate code that throws NotImplementedException #56847
  • SmartBreakLineWithTabTabCompletion2 is flaky #56394
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Added navigation to find references integration tests #56866
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393966 #56865
  • Treat receviers as by-value for interpolated string handler constructors #56864
    Area-Compilers
  • [DNM] Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56861
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Build CodeAction description into table and only generate Dev17 hash #56860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove user facing option around async-lightbulbs (17.1 and up only) #56858
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add anonymous method example to breaking changes document #56857
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393331 #56855
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393171 #56850
    auto-merge
  • Switch to ImmutableArray from raw arrays to prevent accidental mutation #56849
    Area-IDE
  • Remove containing type from lightbulb for AddParameter and GenerateMember #56846
    Area-IDE
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56840
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56851
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable async lightbulbs in 17.0 #56816
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1392248 #56839
    auto-merge
  • Stop including codebase for LSP protocol packages #56834
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Account for a ref returning lambda as a local variable initializer. #56814
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Port perf fix to release/dev17.0 #56805
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56835
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56830
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56831
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require the platform cache service in our package to ensure it's included when we are installed #56820
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0.P5
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56832
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • See through ref pointer indirection when optimizing stack locals #56790
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, UX Review Requested
  • Emit compiler version to Windows PDB #56759
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Delete remaining bits of IWaitIndicator #56355
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid UI dependency in CloudCache by passing along the solution folder #56829
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Add test verifying VB error ranges #56772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Analysis of attributes in conversions of lambdas #56792
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move tooling issues from aspnetcore -> aspnetcore-tooling #37112
  • Route constraints doesn't work in minimal Web API #37109
  • Blazor @key with dynamic column data #37108
  • Startup regression: plaintext #37107
  • ERROR Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SNI.dll' or one of its dependencies: Access is denied. #37106
  • Typos in React SPA template FetchData.js #37105
  • Blazor WASM AOT code is 1 to 1.5 orders of magnitude slower than native CLR #37104
  • React SPA template is cumbersome to use when adding new API routes due to the proxy requirement #37103
  • Templates with <Nullable>enable</Nullable> are very irritating to get started with #37099
  • Open- API issues for .NET7 Planning #37098
  • Consider adding 'SPA' keyword to all SPA templates (React, Angular, etc.) #37097
  • Packing Blazor Webassembly client excludes _framework folder #37095
  • Blazor WebAssembly SPA unauthorized when sending request to API which is hosted on http.sys with windows authentication #37093
  • Blazor and project level Nullable directive #37090
  • LinkGenerator.GetPathByName throws exception on inferred route name because method of the same name but different scope #37089
  • UseTokenLifeTime behavior clarification after testing #37087
  • Startup improvement: json #37086
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #37085
  • Blazor WASM Support running without server #37084
  • Test failure: `ShadowCopyE2EWorksWithOldFoldersPresent` #37081
    7.0-preview1
  • Test failure: `CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser` #37080
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor wasm apps always running in production mode #37079

Closed

  • EventCallback type modifications don't re-trigger TagHelper resolution #36621
    17.0-Preview5
  • Embedded JavaScript doesn't get TextMate colorization in dark theme #36673
    17.0-Preview5
  • Directive completions seem to disappear with larger completion lists #36623
    17.0-Preview5
  • VS is slow to start making requests of Language Servers #31416
    17.0-Preview5
  • [WebToolsE2E]After creating ASP.NET Core Web App , open Layout.cshtml and type "<input asp-for = "Test“ />", the intellisense list also show #33418
    17.0-Preview5
  • HTML comment completion broken #35536
    17.0-Preview5
  • Issues with file name completions in Blazor app #34009
    17.0-Preview5
  • Unhandled exception. System.NotSupportedException: The environment changed. Changing the host configuration is not supported #36876
  • Response.Cookies.Append cannot set cookie value without encoding #36992
  • Results.Problem does not support configuring Extensions #36848
    6.0-rc2
  • Licence of AspnetCore 3.1 and 5? #37091
    Discussions
  • Question: Blazor WebAssembly project template in .Net 6, no more main method? #37072
    Discussions
  • Discussion: Guidance on using the new JavaScript Initializers in Blazor/.Net 6 #37078
  • .NET 6.0 RC1 on macOS Apple M1: Blazor WASM AOT build generates & serves both, large dotnet.wasm and all the .DLLs #37092
  • Epic: Minimal hosting and actions #32378
    6.0.0
  • Omnisharp + Razor Source generator = sad face #30750
    6.0.0
  • Modify ViewBag in Controller will cause RuntimeBinderException in 6.0.0-preview4 #33325
    6.0.0
  • Epic: Minimal API - OpenAPI features #34514
    6.0.0
  • Static web assets not being included with NuGet package #36847
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37055
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #36083
  • Startup improvement: mvc #37054
  • Usage of IViewLocalizer with Html.PartialAsync #37058

  • [Bug] Unable to build app over command line #2754

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Global query filter warning raised for TPH entities #26216
  • InMemory: Owned navigation for required dependent can generate join #26214
  • Value conversion from null in the store generates bad queries #26210
  • Value conversion to null in the store generates bad queries #26209
  • UsingEntity overloads could be more helpful at matching the by-convention configuration #26208
  • Scaffolding many-to-many creates excessive new lines in OnModelCreating #26207
  • Scaffolding many-to-many does not initialize skip navigations #26206
    6.0.0
  • Getting NullReferenceException when calling ExecuteSqlRaw(...) api using IBM EF Core provider #26203
  • ObjectDisposedException on retrieval of a once-disposed DbContext from PooledDbContextFactory in EF Core 6 #26202
  • HasDbFunction and HasTranslation not working as expected #26199

Closed

  • Allow generate inner join on Include #26194
  • Can't generate a compiled model with keyless entity #26195

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] InMemory: Expand owned navigation as optional always #26213
  • [6.0] RevEng: Initialize skip collection navigations in ctor #26212
  • Query: Throw for FromSql+Any pattern which has been mutated #26211
  • [6.0] Separate design time and runtime service for NamedConnectionStringResolver #26205
  • [6.0] Test changes to make sure applicationName is set when using new template pattern #26204
    blocked
  • update odata tests to 8.0 #26201

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26191
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Fix to #26166 - Idempotent migration script generates problematic temporal table alter statement #26193
